html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

If you still haven’t made good on your resolutions to get more sleep, we’ve got some news. A bunch of Presidents Day mattress sales have already started surfacing just in time to save your year (and your aching back). Historically, the holiday is one of the most auspicious times of the year to find a new bed for way less than its usual sticker price, with some of the discounts even rivaling Black Friday prices. And though it doesn’t officially drop until later this month, early bird deals are trickling in already if you can’t be bothered to wait.

Below, we've pulled together a curated list of deals on mattresses we’ve tested firsthand from trusted brands like Casper and Helix—ones where we can vouch for the quality, firmness, plushness, as well as deluxe features like a customizable pillow or euro top or a design with an adjustable base. In a few cases where we haven’t had a chance to test drive them ourselves, we’ve also highlighted some more best-sellers from other popular brands like Serta. Come back and see us later, as we’ll have more intel to add to this growing lineup of Presidents Day mattress sales.

Helix

AD contributor Gabriela Ulloa called the Helix Midnight Luxe “the cradled hug we’ve all been craving” in her review a few years ago, and right now you can find it for 20% off—along with everything else on the x site. The brand is even throwing in a a free bedroom bundle with each mattress purchase, including two Dream pillows, a mattress protector, and a free sheet set.

Helix Midnight Luxe

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Short Queen, RV King

10- to 15-year limited warranty

Side sleepers, hot sleepers

Nectar

Not one, but two AD staffers—contributor Katie Henwood and senior features editor Nick Mafi—have sung the praises of their Nectar beds. This original is an oldie but a goodie—it’s temperature regulated, boasts contouring pressure relief, and a responsive support layer to promote proper spinal alignment. Henwood calls this mattress “a dream come true for all kinds of sleepers,” which offers extra support without sacrificing comfort and feels “like falling into a cloud” every night. It was this kind of feedback that led us to name this memory foam mattress the best mattress-in-a-box during our first-ever Sleep Awards in 2022. Right now, the brand is offering up to 50% off—in other words, you won’t want to hit snooze on this mattress deal.

Nectar Memory Foam Mattress

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Split King

Side sleepers, stomach sleepers, back sleepers, hot sleepers, back pain

Casper

Casper is a stalwart among our staffers’ favorite mattress brands. We’ve tested five of their beds so far, and were thrilled to see some of our favorites included in their 20% off Presidents’ Day sale. Two standout hybrid mattress picks are marked down: the cooling Snow Max and the Dream Max, both of which we found to be suitable for sleepers who like a middle ground between plush and firm. For a budget-friendly pick you won’t lose sleep over, we also recommend The One, Casper’s entry-level foam mattress, now on sale for $600.

The One by Casper

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Split King

Side sleepers, back sleepers

Serta

Serta is offering up to $625 off its wares for Presidents Day, including a deal on this iComfort memory foam mattress. Its firm-leaning makeup offers a first of its kind five-zone response design for optimal spine alignment and all-night comfort, plus includes an inch of graphite-infused memory foam up top for cooling pressure relief. This mattress is also compatible with an adjustable-base frame, making it especially suitable for senior sleepers.

Serta iComfort Mattress

Twin, twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Split King

Stomach sleepers, back sleepers, mobility challenged

BeautyRest

BeautyRest is offering up to $900 off their best mattresses for their Presidents Day sale, including their best-selling BeautyRest Black. This mattress pulls out all the stops, including individualized support and motion isolation, all-night heat transfer, and contouring foams for uninterrupted sleep. The BeautyRest also comes with 10 customizable options, offering everything from extra-firm to plush summit pillow top mattresses.

Beautyrest Black

Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Stomach sleepers, back sleepers

Purple

Sleeping on one of Purple’s proprietary polymer latex mattresses might change the way you think about beds entirely, according to our global content strategy and operations director Diane Dragan. “Even though I thought I was Team Firm Mattress for life, Purple may be my new fave, with its body adjustability combined with springs underneath,” Dragan says. Right now, you can head to the retailer to snag up to $900 off select Purple mattresses and bed frame base sets purchases during their Presidents Day deals bonanza. You’ll also find a few discounts on pillows, sheet sets, and more sleep essentials across the site.

The Purple Mattress

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Split King

Sealy

Sealy is offering up to $200 on select mattresses, including their biggest hit: the PosturePedic. Made in conjunction with orthopedic specialists, this mattress is hyper-focused on across-the-board support. Tencel makes for premium plush comfort alongside a cooling gel memory foam.

Sealy Posturepedic Plus Hybrid

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, Split King

Tuft & Needle

Tuft & Needle is celebrating Presidents Day with up to 20% off on select beds, as well as bedding and other sleep accessories. The brand’s Mint mattress is a particularly good option for side sleepers like former AD PRO features editor Anna Fixsen, who slept soundly on the adaptive memory foam bed. “I found that I could find my comfy place quickly and fall asleep faster,” she previously noted.

Mint Mattress by Tuft & Needle

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King
